title: The most intense film I've seen
review: It was incredible.  The characters interact in very real, very edgy ways.  You never see what it is that they are afraid of - or really have any good idea of what is going on.  As the film progresses, the characters degrade - we see what intense terror will do to a human over time.It's not a gory movie - you only see blood once.  But it is deeply disturbing and terrifying.  Be prepared to have flashbacks to the film long after it's over.  Especially haunting is the final image....
